get.description:
### JSON API compatibility divergence

#### Filters
In JSON API standard (https://jsonapi.org/recommendations/#filtering) one can request elements with multiple
filter values by simply providing them separated by coma:

`triggers?filter[trigger_type]=click,event`

This notation will not work here. You can achieve this functionality by providing multiple filters for the same parameter:

`triggers?filter[trigger_type][]=click&filter[trigger_type][]=event`

parameters.name: page[limit]
parameters.description: Limits the number of returned items

parameters.name: page[offset]
parameters.description: Sets offset for list of items

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated sort list with given attributes: name, created_at, updated_at

has_abandoned_conditions.description: Flag describing whether trigger has abandoned conditions (true), otherwise (false)

has_conditions_with_abandoned_variable.description: Flag describing whether trigger has condition with abandoned variable (true), otherwise (false)

is_published.description: Flag describing whether trigger is published (true) or not published (false)
